about_the_game:
DarkLast - horror in the dark. You have to understand your dark past. The forest is preparing you a lot of surprises. Your task - to get out of the uncharted forest. Swamps and thickets is only a small part of what you will meet.

Information about the game

On the expanses of the game world, you need to explore the dark forest. But everything is not as simple as it might seem at first glance. You are not the only one who is outside of civilization. You will have to fight with mutants living in the places of this rotting world.
detailed_description:
DarkLast - horror in the dark. You have to understand your dark past. The forest is preparing you a lot of surprises. Your task - to get out of the uncharted forest. Swamps and thickets is only a small part of what you will meet.

Information about the game

On the expanses of the game world, you need to explore the dark forest. But everything is not as simple as it might seem at first glance. You are not the only one who is outside of civilization. You will have to fight with mutants living in the places of this rotting world.
name: DarkLast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 - (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: DarkLast - horror in the dark. You have to understand your dark past. The forest is preparing you a lot of surprises. Your task - to get out of the uncharted forest. Swamps and thickets is only a small part of what you will meet.
